name: bridge
description: The bridge is a room or platform of a ship from which the ship can be commanded.

name: galley
description: The galley is the compartment of a ship where food is cooked and prepared

name: utility
description: The utility room is where the generators, pumps and air system located.

name: hallway
description: The hallway is a corridor connected to a lot of rooms

name: armory
description: The armory is where weapons located

name: supply
description: The supply room is where general miscellaneous items located

name: sickbay
description: medical room, where crew members get treated

name: dorms
description: Dorms is where crew members sleep at

name: lab
description: The lab is a place for scientific experiments.

name: playroom
description: The playroom is a place for crew members to rest and entertain.

name: pod
description: Escape pod, for emergency use. It needs a key to open.
